scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One scrapbook of programs, reviews, and notices for New York City and Brooklyn theatrical productions, icnluding newspaper clippings. Several Brooklyn Academy of Music and Florence Dramatic Society programs are included.

Other theaters include the Amphion, Criterion, Park Theatre, Lyceum, Madison Square (Garden), Proctor's, H.C. Miner's People's, Casino, Bedford Avenue Theatre, Herrmann's, Bijou, Daly's, 14th Street Theatre, Grand Opera House, Columbia, Standard, Palmer's, Theatre of Arts and Letters, Star, Empire, and Abbey's.

Organizations include the Caecilia Ladies' Vocal Society, Florence Dramatic Society, Brooklyn Choral Society, Amateur Opera Association of Brooklyn, College of Pharmacy of the City of New York, the Amaranth, and the Symphony Society of New York.
Other venues include the Lee Avenue Congregational Church, St. Chrysostom's Chapel, Brooklyn Tabernacle, Marcy Avenue Baptist Church, Lincoln Club, and the Metropolitan Opera House.
